mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, depart_id, name, email, psd, work_year, user_flag, gender) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set depart_id = #{departId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, psd = #{psd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_year = #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_flag = #{userFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, depart_id, name, email, psd, work_year, user_flag, gender from user
